rs.ac.ns.ftn.tmd.datatypes
Class ScalarNumber

java.lang.Object
  rs.ac.ns.ftn.tmd.datatypes.CrispSet
      rs.ac.ns.ftn.tmd.datatypes.ScalarNumber
All Implemented Interfaces:
FuzzySet
public class ScalarNumber
extends CrispSet

Esta clase implementa un valor escalar simple. Hereda de CrispSet puesto que puede verse como un conjunto cuyo valor minimo es el mismo que el maximo.

Author:
Ivan Obeso Aguera

getModalValue

public double getModalValue()
Description copied from interface: FuzzySet
Calculates the modal value of a fuzzy number
Modal value is the universal value in which membership function value is reaching 1.

Specified by:
getModalValue in interface FuzzySet
Overrides:
getModalValue in class CrispSet
Returns:
value of X where membershipFunction(X) == 1

multiplyScalar

public FuzzySet multiplyScalar(double arg2)
Description copied from interface: FuzzySet
Fuzzy operation for multiplication between current FuzzyNumber and a scalar (double) value.
First argument for the operation is the current object, and second argument is given as a function parameter.
Also for negation of FuzzyNumber, use multiplyScalar(-1).

Specified by:
multiplyScalar in interface FuzzySet
Overrides:
multiplyScalar in class CrispSet
Parameters:
arg2 - constant which will be multiplied as a crisp number
Returns:
number which is the result of the operation

existsImprecision

public boolean existsImprecision()
Specified by:
existsImprecision in interface FuzzySet
Overrides:
existsImprecision in class CrispSet
Returns:
true si el dato que llama a este metodo tiene imprecision simple (es un conjunto numerico o dato borroso) y false en caso de que no tenga imprecision (un escalar)

distrust

public FuzzySet distrust(float minDistrust,
                         float maxDistrust)
Description copied from interface: FuzzySet
Este metodo aplica una desconfianza por debajo y por arriba al dato que llama a este metodo. Por ejemplo si aplicamos desconfianza a un escalar exacto se transformara en un conjunto numerico.

Specified by:
distrust in interface FuzzySet
Overrides:
distrust in class CrispSet
Returns:
